name: post-getUploadedDocuments
description: Returns documents that were previously uploaded for an account holder. Adyen uses the documents during the [verification process](https://docs.adyen.com/marketplaces-and-platforms/classic/verification-process).

accountHolderCode.description: The code of the Account Holder for which to retrieve the documents.

bankAccountUUID.description: The code of the Bank Account for which to retrieve the documents.

shareholderCode.description: The code of the Shareholder for which to retrieve the documents.

$ul: **documentDetails**: A list of the documents and their details.
**pspReference**: The reference of a request. Can be used to uniquely identify the request.
**resultCode**: The result code.
**submittedAsync**: Indicates whether the request is processed asynchronously. Depending on the request's platform settings, the following scenarios may be applied:
**errorCode**: The error code mapped to the error message.
**errorType**: The category of the error.
**message**: A short explanation of the issue.
**pspReference**: The PSP reference of the payment.
**status**: The HTTP response status.
